pull.title: Fix SIGHASH_SINGLE bug in test_framework SignatureHash
pull.body: The value for "other" inputs should be -1 (0xffffffffffffffff) instead of 0

events.message:
Fix SIGHASH_SINGLE bug in test_framework SignatureHash

The value for "other" inputs should be -1 (0xffffffffffffffff) instead of 0

events.body: Any unit tests in which this is exposed?
Shouldn't this affect passing/non-passing of the test? Or is this part of the framework unused?
@laanwj It is unused until the introduction of the test in #8654 (which needs to pass a -1 explicitly for now).
